sense.gloss: New Year's greetings, New Year's call, New Year's gift
congratulatory visit to the Imperial Palace (e.g. at New Year)
Kaga (former province located in the south of present-day Ishikawa Prefecture)
Iga (former province located in the west of present-day Mie Prefecture)
long-life celebrations, particularly the 61st, 77th and 88th birthdays
karuta, traditional Japanese playing cards, esp. hyakunin isshu karuta or iroha karuta
(shrine or temple) donation register, subscription book, subscription list
your coming, coming with happy news, your presence
congratulatory card or letter sent to the Emperor, congratulatory address
New Year's greetings or well-wishes offered by retainers to the Emperor
god of harvests and wealth (syncretized with Saraswati, and often taking the form of a heavenly woman, a white snake or a fox)
god of harvests and wealth (syncretized with Saraswati, and often taking the form of a heavenly woman, a white snake or a fox)
Michelia compressa (species of Japanese tree similar to champak)
coloured family crest (popular amongst people from Kaga)
Ryukyuan mission to Edo upon the change of the shogun
New Year party where greetings (or business cards, etc.) are exchanged

sdata.j: もう↑年賀状↑↓ねんがじょう↓を↑全部↑↓ぜんぶ↓↑書↑↓か↓いてしまったのですか。
sdata.e: Have you written all the New Year's cards already?

sdata.j: ↑年賀状↑↓ねんがじょう↓はもう↑全部↑↓ぜんぶ↓↑書↑↓か↓き↑上↑↓あ↓げましたか？
sdata.e: Have you written all the New Year's cards already?

sdata.j: ペリーは↑浦賀↑↓うらが↓に１８５３↑年↑↓ねん↓に↑来航↑↓らいこう↓した。
その↑祝賀会↑↓しゅくがかい↓で、↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑親戚↑↓しんせき↓に↑私↑↓わたし↓を↑紹介↑↓しょうかい↓した。
sdata.e: He introduced me to his relatives at the reception.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちが↑志賀高原↑↓しがこうげん↓に↑着↑↓つ↓く↑頃↑↓ころ↓には↑雪↑↓ゆき↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓っているでしょう。
sdata.e: It will be snowing when we arrive at Shiga Heights.

sdata.j: ↑友達↑↓ともだち↓に↑年賀状↑↓ねんがじょう↓を↑出↑↓だ↓すのを↑忘↑↓わす↓れてた。
sdata.e: I forgot to send New Year's cards to my friends.

sdata.j: ↑信濃川↑↓しなのがわ↓と↑阿賀野川↑↓あがのがわ↓ではどちらが↑長↑↓なが↓いですか。
sdata.e: Which is longer, the Shinano River or the Agano River?

sdata.j: ↑千賀子↑↓ちかこ↓がいなくなって↑初↑↓はじ↓めて↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓をどんなに↑好↑↓す↓きだったかに↑気↑↓き↓づいた。
sdata.e: It was not until Chikako left me that I realized how much I loved her.

sdata.j: ↑戦勝↑↓せんしょう↓を↑祝↑↓いわ↓う↑祝賀会↑↓しゅくがかい↓が↑開↑↓ひら↓かれた。
sdata.e: Ceremonies were held to celebrate victories.

sdata.j: ↑年賀状↑↓ねんがじょう↓のおかげで↑私↑↓わたし↓↑達↑↓たち↓は↑友達↑↓ともだち↓や↑親戚↑↓しんせき↓の↑消息↑↓しょうそく↓が↑分↑↓わ↓かる。
sdata.e: New Year's cards provide us with the opportunity to hear from friends and relatives.

sdata.j: ↑年賀状↑↓ねんがじょう↓を↑書↑↓か↓くのは↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓の↑習慣↑↓しゅうかん↓である。
sdata.e: Writing new year's cards is a Japanese institution.

sdata.j: ↑古賀↑↓こが↓、あんたの↑半生↑↓はんせい↓で↑一体↑↓いったい↓↑何↑↓なに↓があったの？
sdata.e: Koga, what on earth happened in your youth?

sdata.j: ↑年賀状↑↓ねんがじょう↓はもう↑全部↑↓ぜんぶ↓↑書↑↓か↓き↑終↑↓お↓わった？
sdata.e: Have you written all the New Year's cards already?

sdata.j: ↑佐賀↑↓さが↓↑県↑↓けん↓の↑県庁↑↓けんちょう↓↑所在地↑↓しょざいち↓は↑佐賀↑↓さが↓↑市↑↓し↓です。
sdata.e: Saga Prefecture's capital is Saga City.

sdata.j: ↑滋賀↑↓しが↓↑県↑↓けん↓の↑県庁↑↓けんちょう↓↑所在地↑↓しょざいち↓は↑大津↑↓おおつ↓↑市↑↓し↓です。
sdata.e: Shiga Prefecture's capital is Otsu City.

sdata.j: ↑修学旅行↑↓しゅうがくりょこう↓は、↑志賀高原↑↓しがこうげん↓にスキーに↑行↑↓い↓きました。
sdata.e: We went skiing in Shiga Kogen for our school trip.

sdata.j: ↑昔↑↓むかし↓は↑年賀状↑↓ねんがじょう↓をプリンターでよく↑印刷↑↓いんさつ↓したもんだよ。
sdata.e: I often used to use a printer to make my New Year's cards.

sdata.j: ↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑来↑↓き↓た↑年賀状↑↓ねんがじょう↓は、↑三↑↓さん↓↑百↑↓びゃく↓↑枚↑↓まい↓ほどで、↑丁度↑↓ちょうど↓、↑出↑↓だ↓した↑分↑↓ぶん↓と↑同↑↓おな↓じぐらいだ。
sdata.e: I received around 300 New Year's cards, just about as many as I had sent out.
